body:
Hey!

You've probably seen me around, but you don't know who I am.

My name is Will, IGNS ( MrPwnzMKW, _Tactics, iSkye, DontLook, PingHacks, SeekingAPerhaps, Quizas, and Willii) and I'm a 14 year old living the California life. I feel quit blessed to be in the position I am in now: great community, great school, great friends, dating, and most of all gifted with athleticism.

I've probably been around the server longer that you have, back in McZone and the good days <3. I've never really poked my head into teamspeak, other than horribly failing my first interview for mod. I play frequently in-game, and am kinda active on the forums (Say Hi to me InGame!)

Add me on Instagram:   willli_

Shoot At Me For That AMA!
